overview:
Lisa Angelettie is the president of Lisa Angelettie Worldwide http://LisaAngelettie.com where she works with entrepreneurs who want to create and leverage marketable content that establishes credibility, attracts more qualified clients, and generates more passive income.

Using the principles she teaches internationally, Lisa went from a start-up online private practice to one that was getting major press and tons of clients, in less than 12 months online. Nine years later, Lisa now runs a content marketing business teaching solo-entrepreneurs internationally how to create compelling content that establishes credibility in their niche, attracts more clients, generates passive income and creates the freedom-based lifestyle that they desire and deserve.

Lisa is a widely respected expert on teaching content and marketing principles for small businesses. Her content rich principles work quickly and consistently to produce results. To receive a FREE audio CD on how to attract TONS more clients & more income with content, go to http://LisaAngelettie.com
